badges.text: §7You're undead -- You're immune to poison and regeneration; instant damage and instant health are inverted; you take extra damage from silver and smite; you cannot drown; and you cannot cross salt lines.

• Immune to the following status effects:
  • Poison
  • Regeneration
• The effects of instant damage and instant health are reversed
• You take an extra 2.5 damage for each level of smite inflicted on you from a weapon
• You take an extra ~3 damage from silver weapons
• Salt lines act as two solid blocks and deal 2.5 damage when broken
§7You're no longer living, so you experience the same pros and cons that undead mobs do.
§eConstant: Cannot be overridden by an upgrade
